name: ember-cli-nearley
description: Wrapper around nearley js to allow for language creation / parsing in ember js
author: Devonte Emokpae

scripts.deploy:release: npm run release; npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:setup: git add -A; git commit -m "Added ember-cli-github-pages addon"; git checkout --orphan gh-pages; rm -rf `bash -c "ls -a | grep -vE '.gitignore|.git|node_modules|bower_components|([.]{1,2}/?$)'"`; touch .gitkeep; git add -A; git commit -m "initial gh-pages commit"; git checkout master
scripts.deploy: ember github-pages:commit --message "Deploy gh-pages from commit $(git rev-parse HEAD)"; git push origin gh-pages; git checkout master
scripts.format: find app addon config tests -name '*.js' -type f | xargs prettier --write | xargs eslint --fix
